about_the_game:
CAR MANUFACTURE - PROLOGUE

Car Manufacture: Prologue is a shortened version of a game about building and managing a car factory. This version of the game is limited to a tutorial, where you will produce your first car and learn the basic mechanics of production and sales. Additionally, there is one challenge mission, where you will need to use your wits to fulfill a special order for military vehicles.
You start in the early 20th century with nothing but a few thousand dollars, which you will use to build your first manufacture. In time you will turn a simple workshop into an effective automatized factory. As you develop new car models and technologies, you will also have to manage your employees in the face of rising labor rights movements. Carefully build your brand’s reputation and promote your products to get ahead in the extremely competitive marketplace of the early automobile industry.

Features

  • Create a fully custom car factory.
  • Build and optimize assembly lines for effective production.
  • Manage several types of stats-driven employees.
  • Promote products and set prices strategically.
  • Develop new car models.
  • Increase your factory’s popularity to draw more clients.
  • Take part in industry events and face additional challenges.


BUILD THE MOST ASTOUNDING AND FASTEST CARS!
The beginning of the XX century brought us new opportunities. Show off the qualities of an excellent leader, as you will become the head of the car factory. It is up to you what will the future of the automotive industry look like.



EXPAND YOUR BUSINESS!
You will participate in the process of creating a car from the beginning to the end. Test manufactured cars as soon as they leave the production line.



HIRE THE BEST OF THE BEST!
Behind every car you create are people, more or less experienced. It is your responsibility to make the factory run at full capacity. Assign tasks accordingly to the skills of employees.



AUTOMOTIVE INDUSTRY OF XX CENTURY AWAITS YOU!
The development of the production line is the keystone. Start with individual stations to turn them later into a group of smaller, more-effective positions. Who knows, maybe in the future you will become a completely independent plant that produces even the smallest screw.



STAY ON TOP
In big business, it is easy to stay behind. Research new technologies and employ supervisors to ensure a top speed production.

name: Car Manufacture: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Build a car factory in the beginning of XX century. Discover new cars and technologies. Manage employees. Make tons of money and stay on top. Car Manufacture: Prologue, being a shortened version of the full game, is a great way to try this automotive tycoon game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
